amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the definition of "significant regulatory action" a rule that would prevent or reduce deaths or injuries caused by explosions and fires related to the ignition of combustible dusts in the workplace.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part B of House Report 112-616 to exempt from the definition of significant regulatory action a rule that would prevent or reduce deaths or injuries caused by explosions and fires related to the ignition of combustible dusts in the workplace.

action.text: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Miller, George.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, George amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 239 (Roll no. 528).
